members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ExportModule implements the IPortable ExportModule Interface using an XmlWriter and the IXmlSerializable Interface on the AnnoucnementInfo object
The Id of the module to be exported
[cnurse] 08/15/2007 Converted to a WAP project for Demo [cnurse] 08/18/2007 Updated to use the IXmlSerializable Interface
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface using an XmlReader and the IXmlSerializable Interface
The Id of the module to be imported
[cnurse] 08/15/2007 Converted to a WAP project for Demo [cnurse] 08/18/2007 Updated to use the IXmlSerializable Interface
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deserializes announcementInfo xml into new AnnouncementInfo instance. If an error occurs, Nothing is returned
deprecated
the xml to be deserialized AnnouncementInfo instance
[erik] 12/07/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Namespace: DotNetNuke.Modules.Announcements Project: DotNetNuke Class: AnnouncementsController -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The AnnouncementsController Class represents the Announcments Business Layer Methods in this class call methods in the Data Layer
[cnurse] 9/20/2004 Moved Announcements to a separate Project
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The SqlDataProvider Class is an SQL Server implementation of the DataProvider Abstract class that provides the DataLayer for the Announcments Module.
[cnurse] 9/20/2004 Moved Announcements to a separate Project
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Settings ModuleSettingsBase is used to manage the settings for the Links Module
[cnurse] 9/23/2004 Moved Links to a separate Project [cnurse] 9/23/2004 Updated to reflect design changes for Help, 508 support and localisation [cnurse] 10/20/2004 Converted to a ModuleSettingsBase class
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fill hydrates the object from a Datareader
The Fill method is used by the CBO method to hydrtae the object rather than using the more expensive Refection methods.
[cnurse] 08/17/2007 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets and sets the Key ID
The KeyID property is part of the IHydratble interface. It is used as the key property when creating a Dictionary
[cnurse] 08/17/2007 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
WriteXml converts the object to Xml (serializes it) and writes it using the XmlWriter passed
The XmlWriter that contains the xml for the object
[cnurse] 08/17/2007 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The DataProvider Class Is an abstract class that provides the DataLayer for the Announcments Module.
[cnurse] 9/20/2004 Moved Announcements to a separate Project
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
